array.string: Increases the damage of High Impact Bolt by 3%.
Increases the damage of High Impact Bolt by 6%.
Increases damage done by elemental attacks by 2%.
Increases damage done by elemental attacks by 4%.
Increases damage done by elemental attacks by 6%.
Ion Pulse and Explosive Surge spawn a static field, lowering the target's damage dealt by 2% for 15 seconds.
Ion Pulse and Explosive Surge spawn a static field, lowering the target's damage dealt by 4% for 15 seconds.
Stockstrike now has a 50% chance to trigger your Ion Cell. In addition, when Ion Cell deals damage, it has a 50% chance to shock the target for 125 additional energy damage over 6 seconds.
Stockstrike now has a 100% chance to trigger your Ion Cell. In addition, when Ion Cell deals damage, it has a 100% chance to shock the target for 125 additional energy damage over 6 seconds.
Ion Cell damage now lowers the movement speed of the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
Increases absorption by 3% and reduces the cooldown of Adrenaline Rush by 30 seconds.
Increases absorption by 6% and reduces the cooldown of Adrenaline Rush by 60 seconds.
Throws a smoke grenade at your feet that releases a large cloud of smoke, causing nearby enemies to have their accuracy with ranged and melee attacks lowerd by 20% for 18 seconds.
Increases the shield chance by 1%. In addition, shielding an attack has a 25% chance to generate 1 energy cell. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Increases the shield chance by 2%. In addition, shielding an attack has a 50% chance to generate 1 energy cell. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.

Increases the critical chance of Stockstrike and Explosive Surge by 15%. In addition, shielding an attach has a 25% chance to finish the cooldown on Stockstrike. This effect cannot occur more than once every 4.5 seconds.

Increases the critical chance of Stockstrike and Explosive Surge by 30%. In addition, shielding an attach has a 50% chance to finish the cooldown on Stockstrike. This effect cannot occur more than once every 4.5 seconds.
Further increases damage reduction by 1% while Ion Cell is active.
Further increases damage reduction by 2% while Ion Cell is active.
Increases the damage dealt by Ion Cell by 25% and increases its shock duration by 3 seconds.
Harpoon has a 50% chance to immobilize the target for 3 seconds. In addition, your Stealth Scan has a 50% chance to immobilize the targets it reveals for 3 seconds.
Harpoon has a 100% chance to immobilize the target for 3 seconds. In addition, your Stealth Scan has a 100% chance to immobilize the targets it reveals for 3 seconds.
Increases the critical strike bonus damage of Stockstrike and Explosive Surge by 15%.
Increases the critical strike bonus damage of Stockstrike and Explosive Surge by 30%.
Storm up to a distant target, dealing 764 kinetic damage, interrupting the target's current action and immobilizing the target for 3 seconds. Cannot be used against targets in cover.
Storm has a 50% chance to increase movement speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
Storm has a 100% chance to increase movement speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
Fires a shot that deals 702 - 813 elemental damage and generates 1 energy cell.
High Impact Bolt penetrates 20% of the target's armor.
High Impact Bolt penetrates 40% of the target's armor.
High Impact Bolt penetrates 60% of the target's armor.
Reduces the cooldown of Cyro Grenade by 5 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Cyro Grenade by 10 seconds.
Increases the critical hit chance of elemental attacks by 3%.
Increases the critical hit chance of elemental attacks by 6%.
Reduces the cooldown of Pulse Cannon by 1.5 seconds and Harpoon by 5 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Pulse Cannon by 3 seconds and Harpoon by 10 seconds.
Increases the damage dealt by Ion Pulse and Gut by 3%.
Increases the damage dealt by Ion Pulse and Gut by 6%.

Increases the effect of your cells while they are active:
Plasma Cell: Increases the tech critical hit chance by 3%.
High Energy Cell: Further increases all internal and elemental damage dealt by 3%.
Ion Cell: Increases the damage dealt by Ion Cell by 8%.
While High Energy Cell is active, you have a 50% chance to generate 1 energy cell every 6 seconds.
While High Energy Cell is active, you have a 100% chance to generate 1 energy cell every 6 seconds.
Guts the target with a knuckle-plate vibroblade, dealing (current weapon) kinetic damage and causing the target to bleed for (current weapon) internal damage over 15 seconds.
Increases movement speed by 7.5% while High Energy Cell is active.
Increases movement speed by 15% while High Energy Cell is active.
Reduces the cooldown of Riot Strike by 1 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Riot Strike by 2 seconds.
Increases the damage dealt by Gut's bleed effect by 5%.
Increases the damage dealt by Gut's bleed effect by 10%.
Increases the damage dealt by Gut's bleed effect by 15%.
Ion Pulse has a 15% chance and Fire Pulse has a 50% chance to make your next Stockstrike free. This effect lasts 15 seconds.
Ion Pulse has a 30% chance and Fire Pulse has a 100% chance to make your next Stockstrike free. This effect lasts 15 seconds.
Recharge Cells regenerates 7% of your maximum health over 10 seconds.
Stockstrike and Gut have a 25% chance to make your next High Impact Bold critically hit automatically.
Grants 8 seconds of immunity from all movement-impairing effects, knockdowns and physics and increases movement speed by 30%.
Ion Pulse and Explosive Surge have a 50% chance to grant Pulse Generator, increasing the damage deal by your next Pulse Cannon by 10%.\nStacks up to 5 times.
Ion Pulse and Explosive Surge have a 100% chance to grant Pulse Generator, increasing the damage deal by your next Pulse Cannon by 10%.\nStacks up to 5 times.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Stockstrike, Ion Pulse and Fire Pulse by 10%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Stockstrike, Ion Pulse and Fire Pulse by 20%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Stockstrike, Ion Pulse and Fire Pulse by 30%.
While stunned, you take 10% less damage.
While stunned, you take 20% less damage.
Emits a fiery pulse wave, dealing (current weapon) elemental damage to the target.
Increase the damage dealt by Stockstrike by 4%.
Increase the damage dealt by Stockstrike by 8%.
Ion Pulse has a 33.34% chance to trigger your Plasma Cell if active.
Ion Pulse has a 66.68% chance to trigger your Plasma Cell if active.
Ion Pulse has a 100% chance to trigger your Plasma Cell if active.
You have a 50% chance to recharge 1 energy cell when stunned, immobilized, knocked down or otherwise incapacitated.
You have a 100% chance to recharge 1 energy cell when stunned, immobilized, knocked down or otherwise incapacitated.
Plasma Cell has a 50% chance when it applies its effects to reduce the movement speed of the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
Plasma Cell has a 100% chance when it applies its effects to reduce the movement speed of the target by 100% for 2 seconds.
Increases the damage dealt by the Plasma Cell by 10% and increases its chance to be triggered by 2%.
Increases the damage dealt by the Plasma Cell by 20% and increases its chance to be triggered by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt by the Plasma Cell by 30% and increases its chance to be triggered by 6%.
Increases stealth detection by 1, melee and raged defense by 1% and reduces the cooldown of Stealth Scan by 2.5 seconds.
Increases stealth detection by 2, melee and raged defense by 2% and reduces the cooldown of Stealth Scan by 5 seconds.
Launches an incendiary projectile, setting the target ablaze for (current weapon) elemental damage and an additional (current weapon) elemental damage over 18 seconds.

High Impact Bolt ignores 15% of the target's armor. In addition, if High Impact Bolt hits a burning target, it has a 50% chance to generate 1 energy cell and refresh the duraction of you Plasma Cell's burn effect if present.

High Impact Bolt ignores 30% of the target's armor. In addition, if High Impact Bolt hits a burning target, it has a 10% chance to generate 1 energy cell and refresh the duraction of you Plasma Cell's burn effect if present.
Reactive Shield has a 50% chance to remove all movement-impairing effects when activated.
Reactive Shield has a 100% chance to remove all movement-impairing effects when activated.
Charged Bolts has a 10% chance and Full Auto has a 20% chance to finish the cooldown on High Impact Bolt and make the next High Impact Bolt free.
Charged Bolts has a 20% chance and Full Auto has a 40% chance to finish the cooldown on High Impact Bolt and make the next High Impact Bolt free.
Charged Bolts has a 30% chance and Full Auto has a 60% chance to finish the cooldown on High Impact Bolt and make the next High Impact Bolt free.
Reduces the cooldown of Recharge Cells by 15 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Recharge Cells by 30 seconds.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Plasma Cell, High Impact Bolt, Incendiary Round and Assault Plastique by 15%.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Plasma Cell, High Impact Bolt, Incendiary Round and Assault Plastique by 30%.
Hammer Shot, Charged Bolts, High Impact Bolt, Full Auto and hail of Bolts deal 3% additional damage to burning targets.
Hammer Shot, Charged Bolts, High Impact Bolt, Full Auto and hail of Bolts deal 6% additional damage to burning targets.
Hammer Shot, Charged Bolts, High Impact Bolt, Full Auto and hail of Bolts deal 9% additional damage to burning targets.
When you take damage, you have 50% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Reactive Shield by 1.5. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
When you take damage, you have 100% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Reactive Shield by 3. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Increases tech critical chance by 1% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 10% on targets below 30% max health.
Increases tech critical chance by 2% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 20% on targets below 30% max health.
Increases tech critical chance by 3% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 30% on targets below 30% max health.
Critical hits have a 50% chance to reduce the active cooldown on Adrenaline Rush and Reserve Powercell by 3. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Critical hits have a 100% chance to reduce the active cooldown on Adrenaline Rush and Reserve Powercell by 6. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.

Throws a moldable plastic explosive that sticks to the target and detonates after several seconds. Standard and weak enemies enter a state of panic while the explosive is active. The explosion deals (current weapon) kinectic damage when it detonates. Standard and weak targets are knocked back from teh blast. Shares a 15 second cooldown with Sticky Grenade.
